rev.desc.rev.desc: recompile due to change to previous panel
change for folders
start panel - changed:
$L.journal=nullsub(journal.pm in $G.rc.global.environment, false) to: $L.journal.pm=nullsub(journal.pm in $G.rc.global.environment, false)
display panel - removed line:
if ($L.journal.pm and $L.mode~="add") then ($rc.view=nullsub(description in $L.file, {})+{$L.update.string}+nullsub(update in $L.file, {});$rc.update={})
and removed line:
if ($rc.view={}) then ($rc.view={""})
Modified apm.edit.problem to return a problem record to update mode if it cannot be closed due to format control validation errors.
added and (not $L.same or nullsub($pmc.actions, {""})~={""}) to the 2nd decision on panel decide.prompt.back.
implement us.consume.resouce so that if opening problem from call it is executed before problem is opened.
scmsg() fix on the display.go panel
Save a copy of the $pmc.* variables before call sc.knowledge and restore them upon returning.
Return to display instead of exiting if the lock is not successful when starting the close process.

Added code to set $L.true based on value of update capability in the profile record. Also added code to unlock the problem and set the mode to browse after return from sc.knowledge if not allowed to update record and no return value set.
Added "retrieve.kpak" option.
Doesn't lose $pmc.actions contents when viewing pagelist.
Reselect the first problem ticket after refreshing the probsummary list.
process $pmc.actions when switching to resolve mode.
added expressions to clone.set panel to set alert.time and deadline.alert fields to NULL so that the alerts would calculate correctly for the cloned ticket.
Stamp record when closing.
Doesn't lose $pmc.actions contents when changing categories.
fixed messages
Setup $L.same before changing format field.

Changed condition on check.close.script to use $L.mode="resolve" instead of status in $L.buffer="resolved" since the status is not changed at this point and this exit is never taken when it should be.
Don't change the mode to update after a find. Find does not lock the record.
Changed close message to have standard format and use message application.
Unlock and reset mode after closing a ticket. Makes next/previous work if in close mode.
Fixed return path from Find Solution option - no longer overwrites $pmc.* variables.
Compare $L.file and $L.buffer before prompting for unsaved changes when lock.on.display is true.
Use both environment and pmenv in determining the full.name flag.
took out call to fetch.parts. Better to just store in problem record
added call to fetch parts
Converted to use scmsg().
Added "closelock" to the exit list on decide.post.save.go.
Fixed flow when calling to reopen a problem.
New parameter for sc.knowledge.
Change the mode to browse after moving to the next record.
Get the contents for sc.knowledge from the action field, or the update.action field, or brief.description field - in that order.
If validity or format control fail while closing the ticket reset the mode to update if using the Two Step option.
Also use normal processing on resolved status tickets if not using Two Step.
Added "closeme" to the list of actions that exit after completing.
Use message instead of msg.g
Add the operator name to messages.
When locking the record for the "Lock on Display" option, switch the mode from "browse" to "update".
When deleting clock records while canceling a ticket in "add" mode., nullsub the query to false.
Don't pass the format to pm.lookup.cause.
If in Y2K category post the y2k status to the related device when the problem closes.
cleanup $pmc.details and $pmc.actions.
Separated calls to pm.newcat into opening a new call and changing the category of an existing call. This was necessary because the cancel exits need to be different.
If using full name option stamp updates with the users full name instead of operator id.
When changing the category get the assignment group also.
If the record hasn't changed generate a "save skipped" message when the save button is pressed.
Removed calls to associate applications. Associate options are now run from displayoptions (calling the new screlate.associate application).
Change the way it calls us.print to allow override of special formats.
Delete any clock records for the ticket when canceling while in "add" mode.
When cloning a ticket set the status to cloned until the record is saved (then it is set to open). This allows for format control processing specific to the cloning process.
Reordered close processing to write the notify and linker schedule records after apm.save.problem has been called.
Added new us.print routine to handle printing.
The end exit from pm.newcat goes to display.go instead of exit.cancel. This returns the user to the same ticket without changing the category if they hit back after selecting "Change Category".
Now uses SELECT to fetch fc records instead of select
Unlock the record when moving to the next or previous record or when cloning.
Can now lock at remote sites and unlock from same
Undo while in close mode switches back to update mode.
Don't change the mode to "update" while closing a ticket... setup.linked.close
see below
Set $INTO.PROBLEM=$L.buffer when going $normal. This is to make screlate work.

Used $G.prompt.for.save instead of prompt.on.cancel in $G.pm.environment when checking whether to display the save message when canceling out of a ticket. Also fixed parens on the exit condition of the cancel decision panel.
Changed the check on $pmc.actions to:
(lng(denull($pmc.actions))>1 or denull($pmc.actions)~={""})
set page and total.pages to 1 when cloning a ticket.
when generating the auto-notify callback list schedule record use the notify.format entry in $G.pm.environment for the format - passed as 1 in strings in the schedule record.
Added views button to call views formatctrl.
changed the find parameter to cursor.field.name from current.field.name
Don't save problem if it hasn't been locked when calling notify. Also added a displayoption for not $L.locked.
Removed code added in previous revision.
Added code prior to selecting fc to get sla agreement.id from the dept of contact.name.
Changed callback check to write a schedule file to auto-notify the members of the callback list instead of preventing closing.
Changed the error exit on run.open.script to exit.cancel from exit.normal.
Added the callback option and a check to prevent closing the ticket if the callback array is not null.
The find and fill path was going through display. This caused the $pmc.* variables to be processed - messing up 'corrective actions'. Rerouted to skip this panel and go straight to display.go.
Fixed previous fix to account for adding tickets.
skip the save process when the is not locked, but still show the save message. (Also fixed the save message screen to use the correct message variable.)
added code to put the operator's name or full name (based on full.name in $G.pm.global.environment) into the actor field whenever the record is saved.
changed the criteria for not adding $pmc.actions to the update.action field. before: lng(denull($pmc.actions))>0
after: denull($pmc.actions)~={""}
If user hits "back" from the create category screen, the system now goes out the cancel exit instead of normal.
Enabled parsing of assignment expressions in category records
Moved the messaging out of here and into the problem update trigger
Made mods to properly pass in the operators to send the message to for the message call
Now sends "problem open" message classes on open
"problem close" on close
"problem update" on update
"problem reopen" on reopen
Fixed the condition for setting status="closed" when closing a ticket that will close all related call - "cascade".
Altered Format control code to look for a format control record called "problem" if none specific to a format exists
made reopening a ticket NULL the closed.by and close.time fields.
